column2: This character has Creeping Buboes, which leave horrible itchy red welts
This character has the Green Pox, which causes pus-filled boils to appear and burst, trickling green ichor
This character has the Red Pox, which is sometimes know as the Scarlet Scourge
This character has Rattlelung, and can never seem to stop coughing
This character has Tomb Rot, which causes the flesh to rot away
This character has Nurgle's Rot, and is cursed to spread father Nurgle's "gifts"
This character has Bone Auge, his bones are malformed in terrible way, [This.GetSheHe] is in constant pain
There is an epidemic of Creeping Buboes in this place
There is an epidemic of Rattlelung in this place
Father Nurgle has gifted this place with one his most virulent diseases
There is an epidemic of the Red Pox in this place
There is an epidemic of the Green Pox in this place
You were infected with tomb rot, your body started rotting.
A miracle! You were cured from Tomb Rot.
A miracle! You were cured from Creeping Buboes.
A miracle! You were cured from Green Pox.
A miracle! You were cured from Red Pox.
A miracle! You were cured from Rattlelung.
A miracle! You were cured from Bone Auge.
